016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.parser;
017
018import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.KnownFunctionalGroups;
019import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.StringFunctions;
020import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidAdduct;
021
022/**
023 * Parser implementation for IUPAC Fatty acids nomenclature.
024 *
025 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
026 * @author Nils Hoffmann
027 */
028public final class FattyAcidParser extends Parser<LipidAdduct> {
029
030    private static final String DEFAULT_GRAMMAR = "FattyAcids.g4";
031
032    private final KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups;
033    
034    /**
035     * Create a new instance of a {@link FattyAcidParser}.
036     * @param knownFunctionalGroups the known functional groups
037     * @param grammarContent the grammar text content
038     * @param quote the quotation character used in the grammar
039     */
040    public FattyAcidParser(KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups, String grammarContent, char quote) {
041        super(grammarContent, quote);
042        this.knownFunctionalGroups = knownFunctionalGroups;
043    }
044    
045    /**
046     * Create a new instance of a {@link FattyAcidParser} with default grammar {@link FattyAcidParser#DEFAULT_GRAMMAR} and default quote {@link StringFunctions#DEFAULT_QUOTE}.
047     * @param knownFunctionalGroups the known functional groups
048     */
049    public FattyAcidParser(KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
050        this(knownFunctionalGroups, StringFunctions.getResourceAsString(DEFAULT_GRAMMAR), StringFunctions.DEFAULT_QUOTE);
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * Create a new instance of a {@link FattyAcidParser} with default grammar {@link FattyAcidParser#DEFAULT_GRAMMAR} and default quote {@link StringFunctions#DEFAULT_QUOTE} and default {@link KnownFunctionalGroups}.
055     */    
056    public FattyAcidParser() {
057        this(new KnownFunctionalGroups(), StringFunctions.getResourceAsString(DEFAULT_GRAMMAR), StringFunctions.DEFAULT_QUOTE);
058    }
059
060    @Override
061    public LipidAdduct parse(String text, BaseParserEventHandler eventHandler) {
062        return super.parse(text.toLowerCase(), eventHandler, true);
063    }
064
065    @Override
066    public LipidAdduct parse(String text, BaseParserEventHandler eventHandler, boolean with_exception) {
067        return super.parse(text.toLowerCase(), eventHandler, with_exception);
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    public FattyAcidParserEventHandler newEventHandler() {
072        return new FattyAcidParserEventHandler(knownFunctionalGroups);
073    }
074
075}
